version_description:
iOS/Desktop/Web Client:
- New: Support for SMS with WhatsApp Messenger

iOS:
- New: Dynamic Type support for all Views (Settings | General Text Size)

Desktop:
- New: Recognition of phone numbers with extensions e.g., (914) 334 5857,123
- Fixed: Inability to type accented characters on Windows Vista, 7 and 8
- Removed: "Schedule Call | SMS" actions on Mavericks

- Added support of iPhone X
- Fixed crash during save of images under iOS 11
- Fixed inability to update contacts with transferred data under iOS 11
- Fixed several layout issues under iOS 11
- Minor fixes and improvements

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

- Minor fixes and improvements

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

- Minor fixes and improvements
